title: Cognitive Load Monitoring-Based Adaptive Language Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary cognitive science theories and foundational language education knowledge
context.additional_context: Strengthening language education design competencies based on real-time cognitive load monitoring and analysis using wearable devices (EEG equipment)

learning_goals: Learners can explain the operational principles of EEG-based cognitive load monitoring systems
Learners can design learner-customized language education strategies by analyzing cognitive load data
Learners can apply efficient data processing strategies in environments with limited system resources (memory, battery, etc.)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
